region.hearthvale.name: Hearthvale
region.hearthvale.area.town_square.name: Town Square
region.hearthvale.area.town_square.desc: A bustling square with a fountain and market stalls.
region.hearthvale.area.blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
region.hearthvale.area.blacksmith.desc: A warm forge where the smith hammers metal.
region.hearthvale.area.outskirts.name: Outskirts
region.hearthvale.area.outskirts.desc: Rolling fields and a path into the wild.
region.darkcave.name: Dark Cave
region.darkcave.area.entrance.name: Cave Entrance
region.darkcave.area.entrance.desc: A yawning mouth in the rock, cold air drifting out.
npc.brynn.name: Brynn the Blacksmith
npc.mayor.name: Mayor Elen
quest.main_001.title: The Lost Artifact
quest.main_001.description: Find the ancient artifact for the king.
